modName: Main menu texture and music replacer - Windy Malukah
summary: Main menu texture (mountains & dragon) and music (Malukah - The Dragonborn Comes) replacer. Too fit the mountain feeling I added some of the wind loops from the original Skyrim Game in the background.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/214871-1358555443.jpg[/img]

I thought I could share my new main menu with you. It just represents my own taste of how it should look and sound like. I recently discovered a mod which replaces the texture and music too and I thought Malukah's song fits perfectly for the main menu!
So I replaced the texture with a semi-lore friendly picture of mountains (I like that a lot!), added a dragon from a screenshot of my Skyrim game and mixed the wind sound loops from the original Skyrim game with the music from Malukah.
If you like this mod, feel free to endorse ;)

_________________________________________________________________________________________


[youtube]4z9TdDCWN7g[/youtube]
[color=#BF4000][size=1]The original song performed by Malukah![/size][/color]

[color=#FF8000][size=4][b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b][/size][/color]
Simply unzip the Main Files into your Data Folder.

[color=#FF8000][size=4][b][u]UNINSTALLATION[/u][/b][/size][/color]
Delete the following files from...

[u]/skyrim/data/textures/interface/objects:[/u]
mainmenuwallpaper.dds

[u]/skyrim/data/music/special:[/u]
mus_maintheme.xwm

[u]/skyrim/data/meshes/interface/logo:[/u]
logo.nif

Enjoy!

[color=#FF8000][size=4][b][u]MY MODS[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28642/][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/214871-1361982006.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28060/][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/214871-1355926153.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#FF8000][size=4][b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b][/size][/color]
My special thanks go to 'Malukah' who does outstanding work on video game music!
[url=http://www.malukah.com/musica/]Malukah Music[/url]

And Adeavenor, an artist from alphacoders.com! Thank you for the phantastic wallpapers!
[url=http://alphacoders.com/users/profile/12095/Andeavenor/]Adeavenor's Profile on Alpha Coders[/url]
author: BuzzDee84
